# 👋 Hi, I'm Lang Lang

I'm a data science and economics student at the University of Connecticut (UConn).  
I enjoy uncovering insights from real-world data, building predictive models, 
and exploring how AI and statistics intersect with business analysis and financial 
trend.

- 🎓 Dual B.S. in Statistical Data Science & B.A. in Economics  
- 🌍 Exchange student at University of Mannheim (Germany)  
- 💡 Passionate about machine learning, data visualization, and applied analytics

# 🔧 Projects {#projects}

### 🎯 Gold Price Forecasting (2025 Data Science Competition)
Built regression and ML models (XGBoost, Random Forest) to predict future gold 
prices. Led model development, forecasting, and final report writing.

### 🏠 House Price Prediction (Kaggle + Zillow)
Merged open datasets and used Lasso, XGBoost, and SHAP to predict and explain 
housing prices. Compared baseline and enhanced models for accuracy.

### 📚 GitHub-Based Learning Toolkit
Contributed Python/R learning materials on regression, visualization, and data 
cleaning. Maintained repo, reviewed pull requests, created Jupyter notebooks.
